 2003-01552003-02-11,  ,  ,  ,  HERITAGE,  LAB
ActStatus of the Artist Act
PrecisRe-appointment of DAVID P. SILCOX of Toronto, Ontario, to be Chairperson of the Canadian Artists and Producers Professional Relations Tribunal, on a part-time basis, to hold office during good behaviour for a term of two years, effective March 1, 2003.
